title: Taco Salad
description: Base of greens, with seasoned ground beef, white rice, and roasted peppers and onions. Top with salsa and shredded cheese.

title: Spring Rolls
description: Finely slice veggies like cucumber, bell pepper, avocado, and carrots. Fry tofu in soy sauce. Dip rice paper in water, add your ingredients, and delicately roll. Enjoy with spicy peanut sauce (peanut, lime, sriracha).

title: Simple Salmon Bowl
description: This salmon bowl recipe is the definition of a fast and easy dinner! Throw it all together with a killer sauce and prepare to be amazed.

title: Honey Garlic Shrimp
description: This honey garlic shrimp is so irresistible, you’ll want to eat it every night! A sweet savory glaze covers succulent shrimp, and it’s done in 10 minutes.

title: Epic Vegetarian Fajitas
description: This is an easy vegetarian fajitas recipe! This Tex Mex dinner is full of big flavor and beautiful colorful veggies.

title: Ultimate Vegan Chili
description: Wow, is this the BEST vegan chili! It’s bursting with flavor and is totally plant based. Dollop with vegan sour cream and load with toppings!
